LABEL: 0x253
STRING: After the noise subsides, I'm in the white room once more.

LABEL: 0x28D
STRING: This is the second time, but this strange sensation that I'm floating feels stronger than before.

LABEL: 0x2D9
STRING: It still feels like my upper body is shaking.

LABEL: 0x311
STRING: ――It's been a long day.

LABEL: 0x333
STRING: Heavy fatigue weighs on my shoulders.

LABEL: 0x35B
STRING: Despite how much time has passed, "she" is still here.

LABEL: 0x3AF
STRING: 「How long has it been?」

LABEL: 0x3DF
STRING: "She" answers without even looking at the clock.

LABEL: 0x40B
STRING: 「Let's see... It hasn't even been an hour.」

LABEL: 0x444
STRING: 「How's that――」

LABEL: 0x466
STRING: I'm about to ask how that's possible.

LABEL: 0x490
STRING: "She" interrupts me.

LABEL: 0x4C2
STRING: 「Information has been compressed and sped up.」

LABEL: 0x4F6
STRING: 「As the one experiencing it, it's understandable that you'd feel that it's been a long time.」

LABEL: 0x538
STRING: I see. That may be right.

LABEL: 0x56A
STRING: But there's still something off about that wording, "feeling like it's been a long time."

LABEL: 0x5B6
STRING: This may be nothing more than a virtual world, but I had "experienced" each day and every single event within it.

LABEL: 0x61A
STRING: It really feels like entering another life.

LABEL: 0x65C
STRING: Even though I understand it in my head, it's still hard to accept.

LABEL: 0x69C
STRING: 「So, how was it?」

LABEL: 0x6C4
STRING: "She" asks me a question.

LABEL: 0x6E8
STRING: 「...I left her to die.」

LABEL: 0x706
STRING: 「I left that girl to die.」

LABEL: 0x736
STRING: She was attacked by the light and collapsed.

LABEL: 0x766
STRING: Back then――

LABEL: 0x918
STRING: 「I just couldn't save her.」

LABEL: 0x948
STRING: 「I wanted to save them both. And yet, again――」

LABEL: 0x986
STRING: I unconsciously clench my fists.

LABEL: 0x9B0
STRING: "She" nods silently.

LABEL: 0x9D4
STRING: 「You can't change it.」

LABEL: 0x9FA
STRING: 「And because of that, you have no choice but to accept it.」

LABEL: 0xA30
STRING: Accept it.

LABEL: 0xA4A
STRING: Accept her death as inevitable.

LABEL: 0xA84
STRING: But if I do, the meaning of this endeavor is...

LABEL: 0xAB8
STRING: 「Once more...」

LABEL: 0xAD6
STRING: 「Can't we start over once more?」

LABEL: 0xB12
STRING: I beg, knowing full well how unreasonable my request is.

LABEL: 0xB36
STRING: "She" looks troubled for a moment.

LABEL: 0xC04
STRING: 「That's up to you. But...」

LABEL: 0xC38
STRING: 「You should see this story through to the end first.」

LABEL: 0xC78
STRING: In other words...

LABEL: 0xC98
STRING: 「Are you telling me not to run away?」

LABEL: 0xCC2
STRING: 「To not run away from the consequences of my choices?」

LABEL: 0xCEA
STRING: Even I think that's a dirty way of putting it.

LABEL: 0xD1A
STRING: However, "she" shakes her head.

LABEL: 0xD4A
STRING: 「I have no intention of blaming you.」

LABEL: 0xD74
STRING: 「But... seeing this story all the way through will surely be for your own good.」

LABEL: 0xDC0
STRING: "She" most likely isn't lying.

LABEL: 0xDF0
STRING: In that case, I can't let my choices be for nothing.

LABEL: 0xE2C
STRING: I can't forget everything that's happened so far.

LABEL: 0xE8C
STRING: One of us was assailed by a bizarre light and died.

LABEL: 0xEBA
STRING: It was a relationship that went wrong and crumbled before I could even understand what the catalyst was.

LABEL: 0xF0C
STRING: Like fiction converging with tragedy.

LABEL: 0xF5E
STRING: 「It's an unbelievable story.」

LABEL: 0xF84
STRING: 「It... doesn't feel real at all.」

LABEL: 0xFB0
STRING: I gave "her" my honest impressions.

LABEL: 0xFDE
STRING: 「It doesn't feel real, you say?」

LABEL: 0x1008
STRING: "She" sounds interested.

LABEL: 0x1030
STRING: 「Yes... It's hard to believe.」

LABEL: 0x1058
STRING: 「Because if something like that happened――」

LABEL: 0x1092
STRING: 「"If something like that happened, it would have been more publicized." Is that what you're saying?」

LABEL: 0x10F4
STRING: "Her" guess is right.

LABEL: 0x1112
STRING: 「It's as you say. Well, the media will catch wind of it at some point.」

LABEL: 0x115C
STRING: 「――There was talk of the Mary Celeste in the records, but...」

LABEL: 0x11A6
STRING: 「Katagiri-san, do you know about the Fosdyk papers?」

LABEL: 0x11E0
STRING: I shake my head at the words I've never heard before.

LABEL: 0x1280
STRING: 「It's a mysterious document that surfaced forty years after the Mary Celeste incident.」

LABEL: 0x12D8
STRING: 「In 1913, a strange journal was published in the Strand Magazine.」

LABEL: 0x132A
STRING: 「The author's name was Abel Fosdyk.」

LABEL: 0x135C
STRING: 「He confessed that he had been a stowaway on the Mary Celeste and had written down what had happened on that ship.」

LABEL: 0x13CE
STRING: 「According to him――」

LABEL: 0x13E8
STRING: 「Captain Briggs of the Mary Celeste had suddenly asked the following question:」

LABEL: 0x1450
STRING: 「"Can humans swim in their clothes?"」

LABEL: 0x1486
STRING: 「He then jumped out into the ocean and started swimming.」

LABEL: 0x14BE
STRING: 「Seeing this, some of the crew followed suit and jumped into the ocean as well.」

LABEL: 0x1504
STRING: 「Amid all that, one of the sailors screamed.」

LABEL: 0x153A
STRING: 「When the others looked... they saw that sailors had been attacked by a shark.」

LABEL: 0x1572
STRING: 「The rest of the surprised crew members gathered on the deck.」

LABEL: 0x15B2
STRING: 「But then, another tragedy occurred.」

LABEL: 0x15E8
STRING: 「The deck collapsed.」

LABEL: 0x1610
STRING: 「And so, all of the crew, including the captain, were thrown into the ocean.」

LABEL: 0x1652
STRING: 「Fosdyk himself happened to be able to ride a broken piece of the deck and survive.」

LABEL: 0x1709
STRING: 「...That was roughly how his story went.」

LABEL: 0x173B
STRING: "She" tells the story matter-of-factly, but it doesn't seem very believable to me.

LABEL: 0x1833
STRING: 「Was that, um... true?」

LABEL: 0x1863
STRING: 「It sounds hard to believe. It seems absurd.」

LABEL: 0x18B5
STRING: You're right, "she" says.

LABEL: 0x18E3
STRING: 「Apparently, Fosdyk himself thought so too.」

LABEL: 0x191D
STRING: 「The story was so bizarre that no one would believe it.」

LABEL: 0x1957
STRING: 「Therefore, when he was alive, he never shared his story with anyone.」

LABEL: 0x19A7
STRING: 「The reason it was announced 40 years later was because a friend of his happened to find the notes after his death.」

LABEL: 0x1A0D
STRING: 「If it weren't for that, the story would have never seen the light of day.」

LABEL: 0x1A55
STRING: 「What do you think about that?」

LABEL: 0x1A8B
STRING: Notes that were never made public until after his death.

LABEL: 0x1ABF
STRING: 「I think it sounds persuasive.」

LABEL: 0x1AED
STRING: 「If I had a similar experience, I don't think I'd feel like sharing it either.」

LABEL: 0x1B47
STRING: No one would believe it.

LABEL: 0x1B7B
STRING: If you try to convince someone by force, the message will get twisted.

LABEL: 0x1BB3
STRING: 「I think so too.」

LABEL: 0x1BD5
STRING: 「Then again, if this record had been published right after the accident, everyone would have thought it was a fabrication as well.」

LABEL: 0x1C31
STRING: 「But, he had kept it a secret until he died.」

LABEL: 0x1C6B
STRING: 「He hadn't written it for the sake of the public, right?」

LABEL: 0x1CC1
STRING: 「Then, who were the Fosdyk papers for in the first place?」

LABEL: 0x1D13
STRING: An absurd truth that was made public forty years later.

LABEL: 0x1D49
STRING: Instead of questioning whether it's the truth or not,

LABEL: 0x1D77
STRING: "she" asks another question.

LABEL: 0x1DA5
STRING: 「For who...?」

LABEL: 0x1DC5
STRING: If the papers were not revealed until his death, then there was nothing in it for anyone.

LABEL: 0x1E1F
STRING: 「Was that really the case?」

LABEL: 0x1E49
STRING: 「Fosdyk wrote down the "truth" in the form of a memoir. Of course, it may have been a record for his own use only, but...」

LABEL: 0x1EC1
STRING: 「Stories are often written for someone else, aren't they?」

LABEL: 0x1F07
STRING: There is no story without a reader.

LABEL: 0x1F37
STRING: Or, a record without a reader in this case.

LABEL: 0x1F65
STRING: All writing is written with the reader in mind.

LABEL: 0x2009
STRING: 「In that case, who was the "reader" of the Fosdyk papers?」

LABEL: 0x2059
STRING: "Her" pale hand affectionately strokes the black box.

LABEL: 0x2095
STRING: The cube filled with the records from the year 2033.

LABEL: 0x20C9
STRING: 「This is the same thing.」

LABEL: 0x20FF
STRING: 「This record is filled with unbelievable stories.」

LABEL: 0x213D
STRING: A left-behind record of an unbelievable truth.

LABEL: 0x2169
STRING: If the images from the box "she's" holding playing back in my smart glasses are similar to the Fosdyk papers, then...

LABEL: 0x21D3
STRING: Who was the record left for?

LABEL: 0x22B1
STRING: 「Let me ask a slightly different question.」

LABEL: 0x22EB
STRING: 「Do the Fosdyk papers really exist?」

LABEL: 0x232B
STRING: My reaction is a delayed one.

LABEL: 0x2367
STRING: 「Do they exist? Weren't they published in a paper...?」

LABEL: 0x23A3
STRING: I can't grasp the meaning of her question.

LABEL: 0x23CF
STRING: 「Ah, I'm sorry.」

LABEL: 0x23F1
STRING: 「That was a bad way of phrasing it... Let me correct myself.」

LABEL: 0x2421
STRING: 「What I mean is, were the Fosdyk papers actually written by Abel Fosdyk?」

LABEL: 0x2487
STRING: A question that challenges all assumptions.

LABEL: 0x24BF
STRING: 「...If it wasn't him who wrote it, then who?」

LABEL: 0x2509
STRING: It sounded like a question, but it doesn't seem like "she's" going to make me seriously think about it.

LABEL: 0x2551
STRING: "Her" answer comes immediately.

LABEL: 0x2577
STRING: 「A friend of Fosdyk's, of course. The friend who discovered his memoir...」

LABEL: 0x25D1
STRING: "Of course," she says, but I didn't expect her answer.

LABEL: 0x260B
STRING: 「Why do you think that?」

LABEL: 0x2635
STRING: "She" weaves a logic I don't anticipate.

LABEL: 0x266B
STRING: 「That memoir... More than anything, it made Fosdyk's memory survive.」

LABEL: 0x26BB
STRING: It wasn't just about leaving behind an unbelievable story.」

LABEL: 0x26F7
STRING: 「The name of Fosdyk has been passed down to future generations along with that enticingly mysterious document.」

LABEL: 0x2753
STRING: 「Even now, more than a hundred years later, we're still talking about him here.」

LABEL: 0x27AE
STRING: 「The story of a man we've never met, heard his voice, or even seen a picture of.」

LABEL: 0x2808
STRING: I understand now that "she" tells me.

LABEL: 0x2828
STRING: 「...In other words, a friend of Fosdyk's...」

LABEL: 0x285C
STRING: 「Told such an absurd story in order to pass down his name to future generations...?」

LABEL: 0x28B2
STRING: Despite the lack of proof in the words, my voice sounds convinced.

LABEL: 0x290E
STRING: 「It's just a theory of mine. Do you not like the idea?」

LABEL: 0x294A
STRING: In order to preserve the name of their late friend, they used an anecdote about the ghost ship.

LABEL: 0x2988
STRING: I hadn't thought about it that way. However...

LABEL: 0x29B4
STRING: 「No... I think it's plausible.」

LABEL: 0x29E2
STRING: 「That's an interesting way of thinking.」

LABEL: 0x2A06
STRING: I see, "she" says and lets out a small laugh.

LABEL: 0x2A3C
STRING: As usual, I can't see "her" expression.

LABEL: 0x2A6E
STRING: I can only hear "her" voice through the smart glasses.

LABEL: 0x2AA6
STRING: However――

LABEL: 0x2ABE
STRING: Even so, I can sense that "she's" trying to tell me something.

LABEL: 0x2B7A
STRING: 「Katagiri-san, why――」

LABEL: 0x2BA2
STRING: I can't hear what "her" next words are.

LABEL: 0x2BCE
STRING: No, it's not that I can't hear "her."

LABEL: 0x2BFE
STRING: 「"Why did you survive?"」

LABEL: 0x2C38
STRING: They're words I don't want to hear.

LABEL: 0x2C60
STRING: 「――Have you ever thought of it that way?」

LABEL: 0x2C90
STRING: 「That if you don't survive, someone else will instead.」

LABEL: 0x2CD6
STRING: Why did I survive?

LABEL: 0x2CF6
STRING: My thoughts stop for a moment.

LABEL: 0x2DBA
STRING: 「...That was a stupid question, wasn't it?」

LABEL: 0x2DDC
STRING: "She" nods quietly.

LABEL: 0x2E00
STRING: 「But... I'm sure it's a mistake to think that way.」

LABEL: 0x2E3E
STRING: There's something heartrending about "her" voice.

LABEL: 0x2E74
STRING: If it's a mistake to think about why one survived...

LABEL: 0x2EC4
STRING: As long as "they" don't exist, it's correct, I guess...

LABEL: 0x2F04
STRING: ..."They?"

LABEL: 0x2F20
STRING: What am I, the person watching these records, thinking?

LABEL: 0x2F60
STRING: 「...I'm sorry. We've talked too much.」

LABEL: 0x2F92
STRING: "She" faces forward again.

LABEL: 0x2FC2
STRING: 「Shall we go back one more time?」

LABEL: 0x2FEC
STRING: 「There's not much time left.」

LABEL: 0x3016
STRING: 「You're finally getting closer to the truth.」

LABEL: 0x3046
STRING: I don't need... the truth.

LABEL: 0x306C
STRING: That isn't what I'm after to begin with.

LABEL: 0x309C
STRING: 「How can we reach the best possible outcome...? That's all I want to know.」

LABEL: 0x30DC
STRING: ...There's still a possibility.

LABEL: 0x3108
STRING: I'll continue fighting against these "two survivors."

LABEL: 0x3138
STRING: And once again, my senses are being rewritten by the records.

LABEL: 0x3178
STRING: Once again, I'll return to that sunken ship.

LABEL: 0x31A4
STRING: As I fall into the darkness, "her" final words linger in my ears.

LABEL: 0x3254
STRING: 「――If you reach the worst possible outcome while aiming for the best,

LABEL: 0x3296
STRING: what will you do?」
